list_definition.definition: to declare not to be true

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He denied the charge of theft.

list_definition.definition: to refuse (to give or grant someone something); to say ’no’ to

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He was denied admission to the party.
